data.lyric:
[ti:You Make It Easy]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:You Make It Easy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Make It Easy - Jason Aldean (杰森·阿尔丁)
[00:01.77]Written by：Tyler Hubbard/Brian Kelley/Morgan Wallen/Jordan Schmidt
[00:03.55]Like a rainy Sunday morning makes me want to stay in bed
[00:07.32]Twisted up all day long
[00:10.94]
[00:14.48]You're my inspiration girl you take me places
[00:17.23]Put the words right into these songs
[00:21.85]
[00:25.32]Stealing kisses under cover babe
[00:28.02]See forever when I see your face
[00:30.67]And I swear god made you for me
[00:34.42]
[00:34.98]You make it easy
[00:39.34]Lovin' up on you
[00:41.07]Make it easy
[00:44.36]With every little thing you do
[00:46.66]You're my sunshine in the darkest days
[00:49.76]My better half my saving grace
[00:52.58]You make me who I wanna be
[00:56.30]
[00:57.19]You make it easy
[01:01.35]
[01:03.60]You took all my rough around the edges
[01:06.31]Never let it ruffle up your feathers angel
[01:10.94]
[01:14.49]Yeah I'm down for life you got me wrapped around your finger
[01:17.68]And I like it just in case you can't tell
[01:21.91]
[01:24.01]You make it easy
[01:28.44]Lovin' up on you
[01:30.07]Make it easy
[01:32.88]
[01:33.44]With every little thing you do
[01:35.78]You're my sunshine in the darkest days
[01:38.82]My better half my saving grace
[01:41.62]You make me who I wanna be
[01:45.91]You make it easy
[01:49.54]
[02:08.95]Stealing kisses under cover babe
[02:11.71]See forever when I see your face
[02:14.31]And I swear god made you for me
[02:18.03]
[02:18.60]You make it easy
[02:22.68]Lovin' up on you
[02:24.65]Make it easy
[02:27.80]With every little thing you do
[02:30.11]You're my sunshine in the darkest days
[02:33.41]My better half my saving grace
[02:36.16]You make me who I wanna be
[02:39.77]
[02:40.38]You make it easy
[02:45.04]
[02:51.49]You make it easy
data.trans:
[ti:You Make It Easy]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:You Make It Easy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.77]//
[00:03.55]像是烟雨蒙蒙的星期天的早晨 我只想窝在床上
[00:07.32]一整天都浑浑噩噩
[00:10.94]
[00:14.48]你给我鼓舞 女孩 你已占据我心
[00:17.23]把这份爱融入到这首歌里
[00:21.85]
[00:25.32]多想偷偷亲吻你的面颊 宝贝
[00:28.02]一见到你 我就明白了什么是永恒
[00:30.67]我发誓 你一定是我的命中注定
[00:34.42]
[00:34.98]你轻而易举 
[00:39.34]就将我俘获
[00:41.07]轻而易举
[00:44.36]你的一举一动都牵动我心
[00:46.66]你就是无尽黑暗里 我的阳光 
[00:49.76]你就是我的另一半 是我的救赎
[00:52.58]你使我成为更好的自己
[00:56.30]
[00:57.19]你轻而易举 
[01:01.35]
[01:03.60]你使我变得小心翼翼
[01:06.31]我绝不会让你受到一丝一毫的伤害
[01:10.94]
[01:14.49]是的 我已彻底为你沉沦 只想与你相依相偎
[01:17.68]我就喜欢这样 因为我害怕你会忽略我
[01:21.91]
[01:24.01]你轻而易举 
[01:28.44]就将我俘获
[01:30.07]轻而易举
[01:32.88]
[01:33.44]你的一举一动都牵动我心
[01:35.78]你就是无尽黑暗里 我的阳光 
[01:38.82]你就是我的另一半 是我的救赎
[01:41.62]你使我成为更好的自己
[01:45.91]你轻而易举 
[01:49.54]
[02:08.95]多想偷偷亲吻你的面颊 宝贝
[02:11.71]一见到你 我就明白了什么是永恒
[02:14.31]我发誓 你一定是我的命中注定
[02:18.03]
[02:18.60]你轻而易举 
[02:22.68]就将我俘获
[02:24.65]轻而易举
[02:27.80]你的一举一动都牵动我心
[02:30.11]你就是无尽黑暗里 我的阳光 
[02:33.41]你就是我的另一半 是我的救赎
[02:36.16]你使我成为更好的自己
[02:39.77]
[02:40.38]你轻而易举 
[02:45.04]
[02:51.49]你轻而易举
